stimulusHtml: A system consists of two identical blocks connected by a rod of negligible mass. At the instant shown, the velocity of the center of mass is zero and the system has a nonzero acceleration to the right. Which of the following statements must be true?
choicesHtml: The net force on the system is zero.
The net force on the right block is greater than the net force on the left block.
There is a net force exerted on the system directed to the left.
There is a net force exerted on the system directed to the right.
